title: Redeploy current application build (no feature changes)

requirements.summary: Trigger a new deployment from the current codebase without changing app behavior, and capture deploy logs if it fails again.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment is triggered using the current repository state.
If deployment fails again, provide the full deployment error output/logs so the failure can be diagnosed in a follow-up change request.

file_operations.description: Add a non-functional redeploy note file whose commit can be used to trigger a fresh deployment without changing UI or frontend logic. Include brief instructions for collecting and attaching the full deployment error output/logs if the deployment fails again.
